summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ACE (Academic Clarity Engine) - Penn State academic advisor app. All core features working correctly including signup, login, Bearer token authentication, 3-step onboarding, main assistant with AI chat, and protected routes.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/ root endpoint returns success
Backend API /api/user/profile-options returns campus, academic levels, credit loads, financial aid options
Backend API /api/policies returns Penn State policies with correct structure
Backend API /api/auth/signup creates new user and returns session_token
Backend API /api/auth/signup rejects duplicate email with 400 error
Backend API /api/auth/login works with email/password authentication
Backend API /api/auth/login rejects invalid password with 401
Backend API /api/auth/login rejects non-existent user with 401
Backend API /api/auth/me works with Bearer token authentication
Backend API /api/auth/me rejects requests without token (401)
Backend API /api/auth/me rejects invalid tokens (401)
Backend API /api/user/profile returns user profile data
Backend API /api/user/profile POST updates profile (onboarding)
Backend API /api/student/intelligence returns personalized insights based on profile
Backend API /api/chats returns user chat sessions
Backend API /api/chat/send works with AI integration (GPT-5.2) and returns structured responses
Backend API /api/chat/{id} returns specific chat session
Backend API /api/chat/{id} DELETE removes chat session
Backend API /api/auth/logout successfully logs out user
Protected routes require authentication (401 for /user/profile, /chats, /chat/send, /student/intelligence)
Frontend Login page loads with email/password form and Google OAuth button
Frontend Signup page loads with complete registration form
Frontend Signup flow creates user and redirects to onboarding
Frontend Onboarding 3-step wizard works (Campus/Major, Academic Standing, Additional Info)
Frontend Profile completion redirects to main assistant
Frontend Login with existing user redirects to main assistant
Frontend Main assistant interface loads with sidebar, intelligence card, chat workspace
Frontend Chat functionality works - messages sent and AI responses received
Frontend AI responses include clarifying questions and structured format
Frontend Chat history appears in left sidebar
Frontend Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Frontend localStorage stores session token (ace_session_token)
Frontend Bearer token attached to API requests via axios interceptor
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Bearer token authentication properly implemented in both backend and frontend
API interceptors correctly handle 401 responses and redirect to login
Profile completion check works correctly in route protection
seed_data_creation: Created test users during testing via signup API
context_for_next_testing_agent: All authentication flows (signup, login, Bearer token auth) are working correctly. The refactoring from session cookies to localStorage/Bearer tokens is complete and functional. Test users created during testing can be used for future tests. The AI chat integration with GPT-5.2 is working and returns structured responses with clarifying questions.

features_verified.signup_flow: Working - creates user, returns session_token, redirects to onboarding
features_verified.login_flow: Working - authenticates user, returns session_token, redirects based on profile_complete
features_verified.bearer_token_auth: Working - localStorage stores token, axios interceptor attaches to requests
features_verified.onboarding_wizard: Working - 3 steps (Campus/Major, Academic Standing, Additional Info)
features_verified.profile_completion: Working - updates profile_complete flag, redirects to assistant
features_verified.main_assistant: Working - sidebar with intelligence card, chat workspace, quick access tools
features_verified.ai_chat: Working - sends messages, receives structured AI responses with GPT-5.2
features_verified.chat_history: Working - displays in sidebar, can select and delete chats
features_verified.logout: Working - clears session, redirects to login
features_verified.protected_routes: Working - redirects to login when not authenticated
